name: Mikado free
description:
The original! The international no. 1 hit is finally available on Android!

Mikado is THE world-renowned game of skill involving wooden sticks. Everyone is familiar with it! And now there is finally a proper smartphone version of this classic!

Inspired by East Asian oracle techniques, the game stretches back more than a thousand years and is still extremely popular today. Intuitive controls and easy rules guarantee direct entry and fun from the very first move.

This modern variation of the Mikado game offers two different single-player modes and can be played by up to four people in the multi-player mode. And if no one has any matchsticks to draw lots to find a loser, Mikado can lend a hand with the drinking game “Pick A Loser.”

- Two single-player modes: Classic and Arcade (against the clock)
- Multi-player mode with up to four players on one device
- Bonus game: “Pick A Loser”
- Three different stick sets
- Many more individual settings
- Wonderful 3D graphics
- Intuitive multi-touch controls

Not got any Mikado sticks with you? No problem: Mikado is now finally available on Android. It’s just right for a quick break.
